Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Fullerton
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Fullerton due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Fullerton due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
